mapper.select: SELECT yd_money_record.money_id, yd_money_record.money_num, yd_money_record.money_created_time, yd_user.user_id, yd_user.user_nickname, yd_user.user_avatar FROM yd_money_record JOIN yd_user ON yd_money_record.user_id = yd_user.user_id WHERE yd_money_record.money_type = 4 AND yd_money_record.money_fid = 1 ORDER BY yd_money_record.money_id DESC

SELECT yd_money_record.money_num, yd_user.user_id, yd_user.user_nickname, yd_user.user_avatar FROM yd_money_record JOIN yd_user ON yd_money_record.user_id = yd_user.user_id WHERE yd_money_record.money_fid = 1 AND yd_money_record.money_type = 4 ORDER BY yd_money_record.money_id DESC LIMIT 1;
